ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /

BAN_STICKER.description: ID of the sticker you want to use when banning people.

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

DONATION_LINK.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as support users(gban perms only).

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks.
